General.Name: CSH Alliance Bhd
General.Description: CSH Alliance Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacturing, retail, trading, marketing, and exporting of pottery, porcelain products, and ceramics wares, and ornaments primarily in Malaysia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company operates through five segments: Ceramic, Construction and Property, Financial Services, Transportation and Logistics, and Others. It is also involved in the property investment, construction, development, and related businesses, as well as engages in the moneylending and hire purchase, and general trading activities. In addition, the company provides transportation and logistics services, including haulage and hub-to hub delivery services; and information technology solutions and related services. Further, it is involved in marine construction and coastal reclamation works; styrofoam box and other packaging business; and sale and distribution of motor and electrical vehicles; as well as sales and trading of related spare parts and other related businesses. The company was formerly known as KTG Berhad and changed its name to CSH Alliance Berhad in September 2021. CSH Alliance Berhad was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Subang Jaya, Malaysia.
